name: Mastery Talisman: Buttressed Combined Assault
description:
When a Summon disappears: Gain 1 point of Buttressed Succor (up to 3 points).
When Action Phase begins: Consume all points of Buttressed Succor. For each point consumed, generate 1 Omni Element.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When a Summon disappears:</color> Gain 1 point of Buttressed Succor (up to 3 points).\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When Action Phase begins:</color> Consume all points of Buttressed Succor. For each point consumed, generate 1 $[K411].
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When a Summon disappears:</color> Gain 1 point of Buttressed Succor (up to 3 points).\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When Action Phase begins:</color> Consume all points of Buttressed Succor. For each point consumed, generate 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element</color>.
